comment: She is super sweet and caring. She may not always know what is going on, but she cares and will not let you fail. Take her. I have taken her twice

Doctor Cooper is an amazing professor. She was very laid back and only gave us a handful of assignments. Her less is more approach to the class really made it stress-free! She goes above and beyond in giving students as much help and scaffolding that they need in order to succeed.
rating_tags: Accessible outside class--Graded by few things--Clear grading criteria

comment: Dr. Cooper is such a caring, kind, and funny Professor! She keeps you entertained and engaged throughout the class. Easy assignments that consists of 5 Discussion Posts, 2 Group Projects, and 2 Proficiency Exams. She's such an easy grader! She cared so much about her students. Always available to reach out.

This professor really wants all students to thrive in her class. She gives personalized feedback on assignments, is happy to help students one-on-one, and has a solid teaching approach that encourages student success throughout her course.
